name: FreedomIntelligence/medical-o1-reasoning-SFT
description: The FreedomIntelligence/medical-o1-reasoning-SFT dataset is a groundbreaking resource for the AI community, particularly for those interested in medical reasoning. It was created by FreedomIntelligence and is based on medical verifiable problems. This dataset, which was open-sourced in 2024, is designed to fine-tune HuatuoGPT-o1, a cutting-edge medical Language Learning Model (LLM). The dataset, built using GPT-4o, is unique in its ability to search for solutions to complex medical problems and validate them through a medical verifier, making it an invaluable tool for advanced medical reasoning tasks.
citeAs: @misc{chen2024huatuogpto1medicalcomplexreasoning,       title={HuatuoGPT-o1, Towards Medical Complex Reasoning with LLMs},        author={Junying Chen and Zhenyang Cai and Ke Ji and Xidong Wang and Wanlong Liu and Rongsheng Wang and Jianye Hou and Benyou Wang},       year={2024},       eprint={2412.18925},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.CL},       url={https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.18925},  }
creator: FreedomIntelligence
